page.title: 12TELECOMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {POSTAL SERVICES}- During our survey we noticed that we could not find many post offices, only one in{Quakers Rd} Downend and one in Winterbourne Down. There are several post boxes dotted around the area. People post letters in these. Letters are sorted in the main sorting office in Bristol. {TELEPHONE SERVICES}- Around the area there were several telephone boxes, used to communicate with other people. Many people have telephones in their homes and quite a lot of households have two and sometimes more. {TELEVISION}- This is another way of communicating and we saw lots of aerials attached to houses. When we asked people how many televisions thay had in their houses most had at least two. They had one in their lounge and often one in the bedroom.
